newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: KLM to implement cargo rate rises.
newsitem.headline: KLM to implement cargo rate rises.

text.p: KLM will be implementing a cargo rates rise on November one after several weeks of discussion, a KLM spokesman said.
"Cargo tariffs will definitely be taking the higher fuel prices into account," he stated.
It is not clear whether there will be a blanket rates rise or whether the increase will be dependent on commodity and destination.
Jet kerosene prices have risen sharply since Iraqi troops entered Kurdish-controlled northern Iraq in August.
Earlier Wednesday KLM announced details of passenger surchases due to rising fuel costs from November one. - Air Cargo Newsroom Tel+44 171 542-7706 Fax+44 171 542-5017
